Key Match Events: Kane Williamson suffered a hand injury and retired hurt after being hit by a ball while attempting a single.
Daryl Mitchell scored 89 runs, finishing the game unbeaten and contributing to New Zealand's victory by 8 wickets.
Shakib Al Hasan took a catch to dismiss Litton Das for a golden duck.
Tanzid Hasan scored 30 runs and Mehidy Hasan Miraz scored 30 runs for Bangladesh.
